title: NA Speaker condoles death of Sattar Bachani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jul 07 (APP):Speaker of National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq Monday expressed deep sorrow and grief over the demise of former Member of the National Assembly, Abdul Sattar Bachani, who was also the father of sitting MNA Zulfiqar Ali Bachani.
Paying tribute to the late Abdul Sattar Bachani, the Speaker said he was a seasoned and insightful politician whose political and social contributions will be remembered for a long time.
“The passing of Abdul Sattar Bachani is an irreparable loss to his bereaved family and the people of his constituency,” he said said.
He extended heartfelt condolences and sympathy to MNA Zulfiqar Ali Bachani and the entire bereaved family, assuring them that he stands with them in their time of grief.
The Speaker prayed for the elevation of the departed soul’s ranks and for patience and strength for the bereaved family to bear this irreparable loss.
